com.socialize
Class ShareUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.socialize.ShareUtils

public class ShareUtils
extends Object

Used to perform all default sharing operations like Facebook, Twitter, Email and SMS sharing.

Author:
Jason Polites

Returns the default sharing options for the user.

Returns:

showLinkDialog

                                  AuthDialogListener listener)
Displays the link dialog to allow the user to link to their Twitter or Facebook account.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
listener - A listener to handle events from the link.

Pre-loads the link dialog in the background to improve load speed and end user responsiveness.

Parameters:
context - The current context.

showShareDialog

public static void showShareDialog(Activity context,
                                   Entity entity)
Displays the default share dialog. In most cases this is the simplest version to use.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity being shared.

showShareDialog

public static void showShareDialog(Activity context,
                                   Entity entity,
                                   SocialNetworkDialogListener listener)
Displays the default share dialog and allows for the handling of share dialog events.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity being shared.
listener - A listener to handle events on the dialog.

showShareDialog

public static void showShareDialog(Activity context,
                                   Entity entity,
                                   SocialNetworkDialogListener listener,
                                   int options)
Displays the default share dialog and allows for the handling of share events.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity being shared.
listener - A listener to handle events.
options - Display options for the dialog. These are bit flags taken from ShareUtils.
See Also:
DEFAULT, SOCIAL

public static void shareViaEmail(Activity context,
                                 Entity entity,
                                 ShareAddListener listener)
Shares the given entity via email. This method with launch the default email application on the device.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity being shared.
listener - A listener to handle events.

listener - A listener to handle events.

shareViaOther

public static void shareViaOther(Activity context,
                                 Entity entity,
                                 ShareAddListener listener)
Shares the given entity via a user selected medium. This method with launch the default application share dialog on the device.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity being shared.
listener - A listener to handle events.

                               Entity entity,
                               ShareAddListener listener)

context - The current context.

listener - A listener to handle events.

shareViaSocialNetworks

public static void shareViaSocialNetworks(Activity context,
                                          Entity entity,
                                          ShareOptions shareOptions,
                                          SocialNetworkShareListener listener,
                                          SocialNetwork... networks)
Shares the given entity via a Social Network such as Twitter or Facebook. This will prompt the user to select a network.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity being shared.
shareOptions - Options for the share. If text is available for the share it can be specified here.
listener - A listener to handle events.

                            ShareGetListener listener,
                            long id)
Retrieves a single share event based on ID.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
listener - A listener to handle the result.
id - The ID of the share.

getShares

public static void getShares(Activity context,
                             ShareListListener listener,
                             long... ids)
Retrieves multiple share events based on ID.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
listener - A listener to handle the result.
ids - One or more IDs for the shares returned.

getSharesByUser

public static void getSharesByUser(Activity context,
                                   User user,
                                   int start,
                                   int end,
                                   ShareListListener listener)
Retrieves all share events performed by the given user.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
user - The user who performed the share(s).
start - The start index for the result set (0 indexed).
end - The end index for the result set.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

getSharesByEntity

public static void getSharesByEntity(Activity context,
                                     String entityKey,
                                     int start,
                                     int end,
                                     ShareListListener listener)
Retrieves all share events performed on the given entity.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entityKey - The key of the entity that was shared.
start - The start index for the result set (0 indexed).
end - The end index for the result set.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

getSharesByApplication

public static void getSharesByApplication(Activity context,
                                          int start,
                                          int end,
                                          ShareListListener listener)
Retrieves all share events across all entities.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
start - The start index for the result set (0 indexed).
end - The end index for the result set.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

registerShare

public static void registerShare(Activity context,
                                 Entity entity,
                                 ShareOptions shareOptions,
                                 ShareAddListener listener,
                                 SocialNetwork... networks)
Creates a simple Socialize Share object. NOTE: This does NOT perform any actual sharing (propagation). It is used to simply record the fact that a share is taking place. This is useful when you want to utilize the auto-generated entity links returned in the propagation info response to post directly to Facebook or Twitter.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity to be shared.
shareOptions - Options for the share allowing text to be specified.
listener - A listener to handle the result.
networks - The Social Networks you intend to share to.

canShareViaEmail

public static boolean canShareViaEmail(Activity context)
Determines if the current device is capable of sharing via email.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
Returns:
True if the device is capable of sharing via email, false otherwise.

canShareViaSMS

public static boolean canShareViaSMS(Activity context)
Determines if the current device is capable of sharing via SMS.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
Returns:
True if the device is capable of sharing via SMS, false otherwise.
